descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: The second course in the Fourth-year Arabic sequence marks the beginning of a transition away from textbook-based work, and toward authentic texts selected based on students' academic and professional interests. Students will continue working with the al-Kitaab series (Vol. III), but will also be working with other texts throughout the quarter.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: Completion of 311-1 with C- or higher, or instructor's permission.

descriptions.name: Evaluation Method
descriptions.value: Student evaluation will be based on class participation, homework assignments, short response papers (in Arabic), oral presentations, a midterm exam, and a final exam
